item.title: Vim
item.description: On this page, a jumble of Vim shortcuts and functions are collected that I find very useful. Delete text Some examples: ciw: cut word (without following space), then go into insert mode daw: cut word including following space dd: delete entire line, remain in normal mode c goes into insert mode after deleting whereas d only cuts small w only considers letters big W also considers brackets ctrl-v to enter Visual block mode shift-I to go insert mode, change entire block Command :>> and :<: shift two indents to the right / one to the left
